get_file_data.name: get_file_data
get_file_data.description: Takes the absolute path of a file stored on the local machine and returns its text contents as a string. Handles text/code files (UTF-8), PDFs (parsing), and rejects unsupported types (images/binaries) based on extension. Enforces security (disallowed paths) and size limits (30MB).

file_path.description: The absolute path to the text, code, or PDF file to be read.
